backend/main.mo: Stores contact messages in a Motoko canister and provides methods to submit and retrieve them.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries linking feature IDs to related files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Documents deployment steps, diagnostic flow, and validation guidelines for backend and frontend builds.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the root element and bootstraps the frontend via main.tsx.
frontend/public/elementor/README-element: Explains how to embed the static 3D cafe build into WordPress via Elementor, including setup and limitations.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the 3D scene, top navigation, and menu panel with theme support.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContourFr: Reusable framed container with contour-texture background and styled surface for UI layouts.
frontend/src/components/layout/PanelSurf: Panel layout wrapper with title bar, close button, scroll area, and contour frame styling.
frontend/src/components/nav/HelpButton.t: Floating help button with tooltip that triggers the onboarding overlay.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo and menu button that opens the menu panel.
frontend/src/components/overlays/Onboard: Dialog overlay explaining movement, look, gaze, and proximity interactions with tips and a start button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppViewport.ts: Tracks visual viewport height and sets a CSS variable to stabilize mobile layout changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstVisitFlag.ts: Manages a first‑visit onboarding flag using localStorage with dismiss and reopen helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and submitting contact messages with validation and diagnostics.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with Tailwind layers, custom theme variables, viewport fixes, and safe‑area handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPanel.tsx: Right‑side sheet panel showing descriptive information about Contour Cafe with styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPanel.tsx: Right‑side sheet panel with a contact form and message submission using React Query.
frontend/src/pages/ExportPanel.tsx: Right-side sheet showing WordPress export info, warnings, download link, and setup instructions.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPanel.tsx: Right-side sheet with tabbed coffee, pastry, and dessert menu items.
frontend/src/scene/CafeScene.tsx: Sets up the basic 3D cafe scene with minimal lighting, fallback room, navigation, and error handling.
frontend/src/scene/controls/useCafeNavig: Custom hook enabling WASD and pointer-based navigation with touch support and pointer lock.
frontend/src/scene/environment/BasicCafe: Immediate-render fallback cafe room with floor, ceiling, textured walls, and basic furniture/props.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeEnvir: Builds the full café scene with floor, ceiling, walls, furniture, and textures, signaling when mounted. Uses contour and wall textures plus physics for the floor.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeFurni: Defines 3D models for counter, tables, and wooden chairs using contour textures and simple geometric construction. Provides reusable furniture components for the café scene.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeScene: Adds decorative scene props like espresso machines, grinders, pastry displays, and menu boards. Uses contour textures for some parts and metallic or glass materials for others.
frontend/src/scene/HomeCafeCanvas.tsx: Creates the Three.js canvas with loading/error overlays, WebGL checks, and renders CafeScene.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useContourTextu: Loads a contour texture and creates floor, wall, and furniture variants with wrapping, filtering, and repeat settings. Uses a non-blocking loader and clones textures per use case.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useNonBlockingT: Asynchronously loads a texture without blocking the scene and logs success or failure. Returns undefined on failure and supports optional error callbacks.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useSceneStartup: Provides a watchdog timer that triggers a timeout callback if a scene doesn’t render in time. Resets on scene key changes and exposes a cancel method.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useWallMapTextu: Loads and configures the green wall‑map texture with wrapping, repeat, filtering, and anisotropy. Returns undefined on load failure for graceful fallback.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/DoorCont: Controls an animated door that opens based on camera proximity and smoothly interpolates rotation. Uses a frame loop to update door state.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Inspecta: Implements a draggable, rotatable prop that highlights when inspected. Displays an HTML hint overlay during interaction.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Interact: Empty file placeholder for interaction management.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/PanelPro: Interactive 3D prop component with hover/press animations and different visual variants like card, cup, and sign.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/POIMarke: Renders rotating POI markers with hover and dwell detection tied to camera orientation. Triggers UI panel activation and shows hover labels via HTML overlays.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/poiRegis: Registry of POIs defining id, label, positions, actions, and optional highlight colors.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Proximit: Tracks camera proximity to defined zones and shows an on-screen UI prompt to trigger panel actions.
frontend/src/scene/materials/contourStyl: Provides material creation helpers for contour, wood, metal, and overlay rendering plus preset colors.
frontend/src/scene/SceneErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that reports scene errors and resets on retry.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneDegradedOverl: UI overlay shown when the café scene only partially loads, offering retry and explanatory text.
Error overlay displaying load failure details, optional diagnostics, and a retry button.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneLoadingOverla: Loading overlay that transitions to a degraded-state warning if loading exceeds a timeout.
frontend/src/scene/utils/sceneDiagnostic: Utilities for logging scene load failures or successes and formatting diagnostic stages.
frontend/src/scene/utils/webglSupport.ts: Checks browser WebGL support and required extensions, returning support status and reasons.
frontend/src/state/uiOverlayStore.ts: Zustand store managing the currently active UI panel in the scene.
frontend/src/theme/motion.ts: Defines motion timing, easing, and spring presets and provides a helper for transition strings.
frontend/src/theme/tokens.ts: Theme tokens for colors, typography, spacing, and radii used across the UI.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Provides utilities to log deployment-related errors with contextual details and remediation hints for backend deploy, frontend build, and runtime issues.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and new feature requests for the Contour Cafe project.
